name: One Way Out (Lawless_Heaven)
description:
You are stranded on a planet filled with zombies. The Evil Doc won't let you escape easily. The only way out is to shoot your way through hordes of zombies and face the Evil Doc.  Are you determined enough to take upon this task or will you let fate take you?

WASD to Move

SPACE to Jump

Q to Change Weapon

Right Mouse to shoot

Left Mouse to zoom aim
